videos.title: VS Code Snippets - Boost your productivity with User Snippets
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: Tailwind CSS 3 tutorial - Upgrade to Tailwind 3 | Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial
videos.description: Tailwind CSS v3.0 came with incredible performance gains, huge workflow improvements, and a seriously ridiculous number of new features. In this tutorial - I have tried to explain different new features of Tailwind CSS version 3, how to install tailwind css 3, how to upgrade from tailwind v2 to v3 etc.
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: Debounce Function in JavaScript - JavaScript Job Interview question
videos.description: In this video, I have explained about the debounce function in JavaScript. This is a common question interviewers ask at Job Interviews. If you watch this video carefully, you will understand what is debounce and how to handle it with custom debounce function.
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: SASS Tutorial in English - Overview of SASS
videos.description: In this video, I have given a high level overview of popular CSS Pre-processor SASS which helps us managing our styles at scale. If you have a basic understanding of CSS & JavaScript, this 10 mins SASS Tutorial will help you getting started with SASS.
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: React Router DOM v6 Bangla Tutorial - Breaking Changes - React Router 6 vs 5
videos.description: In this React Router DOM v6 Bangla tutorial, you will learn how to install react router dom 6, what are the breaking changes in react router 6, difference between react router 6 vs 5, how to upgrade from react router v5 to react router v6.
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: Tailwind CSS Tutorial Bangla - Introduction to Tailwind CSS
videos.description: Tailwind is a utility-first CSS framework to rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML. In this Tailwind CSS tutorial, I have given a short introduction and overview of Tailwind CSS in Bangla language. Also, I have explained, why Tailwind vs Bootstrap debate should be stopped as both are useful in their own ways.
videos.author: Learn with Sumit

videos.title: Node.js ‡¶®‡¶ø‡¶Ø‡¶º‡ßá ‡¶è‡¶ï‡¶ü‡¶ø ‡¶õ‡ßã‡¶ü‡ßç‡¶ü ‡¶ó‡¶≤‡ßç‡¶™ - Node.js Tutorial Bangla | Express.js Tutorial Bangla
videos.description:
I am starting the Node js bangla tutorial series with a short story. Before we know something new, we need to know its history. So I'm starting my playlist with this video. I am giving the link to the playlist below. Then I will add all the videos of Bangla Node.js Tutorial to this playlist.

In this whole Bangla Node js series, I will be covering  Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB from scratch. I have also shown a Raw Node.js Project and a Complete Real-time Chat Application at the end of this playlist. Most importantly this node.js bangla tutorial series is absolutely beginner friendly. The only prerequisite is you must know JavaScript. If you have zero knowledge on JavaScript, you can check this recommended JS path - https://lwsbd.link/jspath. Also you will get the MERN Stack flavour in this whole series though we have a separate playlist on React. After completing this playlist you can check the React series here - https://lwsbd.link/react. So If you are a beginner and looking for a complete bangla mern stack tutorial you can carry on this playlist.

Playlist Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WC-g0JtEIwM&list=PLHiZ4m8vCp9PHnOIT7gd30PCBoYCpGoQM

Node.js ‡¶®‡¶ø‡¶Ø‡¶º‡ßá ‡¶è‡¶ï‡¶ü‡¶ø ‡¶õ‡ßã‡¶ü‡ßç‡¶ü ‡¶ó‡¶≤‡ßç‡¶™ - Node.js Bangla Tutorial | Bangla Node js Tutorial Series

References:

1. Ryan Dahl's Presentation Video on 2011 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jo_B4LTHi3I
2. Ryan Dahl's Presentation Video on 2011 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ztspvPYybIY
3. JavaScript Execution Context - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wk0-6b1W_VQ
4. My JavaScript Playlist - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KuhLGuNxF8U&list=PLHiZ4m8vCp9Nflbo9a0pZuLscG_Xc7DKq
5. My Modern JS Crash Course - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PWXkYBmlbB4&list=PLHiZ4m8vCp9MFjMRp9EEHWKArbi0wdgXG
6. w3schools JavaScript Tutorial - https://www.w3schools.com/js/DEFAULT.asp

#nodejs #javascript #bangla_programming_tutorial

videos.description:

‚ñ¨ Contents of this video  ‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨

0:00 - Intro
0:34 - Why mongoose & ODM
05:08 - Benefits of using mongoose
10:34 - Express project & Routing setup
11:11 - Install & connect with mongoose
16:22 - Routing setup
20:40 - Schema Design
27:18 - Mongoose Model
31:05 - .save() - insert single document
36:31 - .insertMany() - insert multiple document
39:54 - updateOne - update single document
44:53 - findByIdAndUpdate()
50:49 - find() - get matching records
58:45 - .deleteOne() - delete single record
01:00:41 - Final words
01:03:38 - Outro

videos.title: Tailwind CSS Tutorial Bangla Adding fifth
videos.description: Tailwind is a utility-first CSS framework to rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML. In this Tailwind CSS tutorial, I have given a short introduction and overview of Tailwind CSS in Bangla language. Also, I have explained, why Tailwind vs Bootstrap debate should be stopped as both are useful in their own ways.
